page.title: 11Family Life in Niton 1985
page.content: John and I have lived in Niton for 15 years.We have four children Hannah (11 years) Emily (7 years) Lynne (5 years) and Daniel (1&a half). The children were born at St.Mary's Hospital,Newport. At 5 years they start school in the village.At 9 years they go by bus to Ventnor Middle School. Niton has many footpaths and the countryside is very interesting. We see domestic sheep,cows,horses and donkeys,and wild foxes, rabbits, badgers, and birds, and many wild flowers. We like to go to the local beach to swim and play. On Monday nights Hannah goes to Youth Club. Their activities include swimming, canoeing, cycling and watching videos. On Fridays Emily goes to 'Brownies". Niton is quiet in Winter,but busy with holidaymakers in the summer.We have found Niton a safe and happy community
